title: Need 2 rito point
body: I'm 2 rito points away from 975 plz rito I'll even call Phreak the Damage Daddy and Aphromoo the Best Butt Buddy to ever live

replies.body: We may be able to help with this!  As DTN mentioned, reach out to us through a ticket or twitter.  We'll take a look into this for you!

You can send your request for a small amount of RP once to Riot Support through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or tweet [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) on Twitter. They will probably request some original League artwork from you in return, but don't worry, you don't have to be an artist! You can draw something with stick figures, write a haiku, or even express yourself through interpretive dance while dressed as your favorite champion!
